purpose: Facilitates the orchestration and management of web browser-based tasks for RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) applications.
principle: Built on a server-client architecture using Node.js to manage RAG workflows and interactions with web browsers.
reusability: Offers a modular architecture with APIs for integrating with other systems and extending functionalities.
limitations: Primarily experimental with limited documentation and support; may require significant customization for specific use cases.
name: mcp-server-rag-web-browser
description: A MCP Server for the RAG Web Browser Actor
